short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save any webpage into an infinitely branching chat to collaboratively curate knowledge.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly capture the website you're on and save it in a new, or existing, treechat thread. Save your favorite content for yourself, or share it with others simply by choosing which Stream to save it to.
